name: No Cops Today - Alpha
description:
What if the local cops suddenly go on a strike?

What if you need to defend yourself, your house and your friends?

This is No Cops Today...

Play Now!

If you like this game, share and donate! 

If we reach our bugdet goal this game will have a lot of improvements like:

- new stages

- new characters

- new martial arts movements

- more soundtrack


If you like it please donate, if you donate and still like it, please share your thoughts with us send a message to nocopstoday@36xgamestudio.com
